Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-01: Does your product process protected health information (PHI) or any data covered by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-02: Does the vended product host/support a mobile application? (e.g. app)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-03: Will institution data be shared with or hosted by any third parties? (e.g. any entity not wholly-owned by your company is considered a third-party)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-04: Do you have a Business Continuity Plan (BCP)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-05: Do you have a Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-06: Will data regulated by PCI DSS reside in the vended product?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Qualifiers (v2.11)
Question: QUAL-07: Is your company a consulting firm providing only consultation to the Institution?
